meanings.sent1: I received a cablegram from my friend overseas.
meanings.sent2: The cablegram contained urgent news from abroad.
meanings.sent3: The cablegram was so unexpected that I nearly dropped my tea.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cablegram of happiness, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cablegram brought tears of joy to my eyes, knowing my family was safe.

meanings.definition: To send a message by cable
meanings.sent1: I will cablegram the details to you tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: They decided to cablegram their boss about the new project.
meanings.sent3: He cablegrammed his love for her in a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The idea cablegrammed through the team, sparking excitement.
meanings.sent5: She cablegrammed her gratitude, knowing it would reach him in time.
